text: {| class="infobox football" style="width: 16em; text-align: center;" |- ! style="font-size: 16px;" |Tahiti Ligue 2 |- ! style="font-size: 16px;" | |- | style="font-size: 12px; background: #BFD7FF;" | Nation |- | style="font-size: 12px;" | |- | style="font-size: 12px; background: #BFD7FF;" | Promotion To |- | style="font-size: 12px;" | Ligue 1 |- | style="font-size: 12px; background: #BFD7FF;" | Number of Teams |- | style="font-size: 12px;" | 10 |- |} The Tahitian Ligue 2 is the second tier of the Fédération Tahitienne de Football in French Polynesia. ==Competition format== The season begins with a regular league. At the end of the regular season the teams enter a play-off league with the bottom teams from the Ligue 1 to try and win promotion. == Teams == :These are the teams for the 2018–19 Tahiti Ligue 2 season: *A.S. Excelsior *A.S. Mataiea *A.S. Olympique de Mahina *A.S. Papara *A.S. Papenoo *A.S. Tamarii Punaruu *A.S. TAC *A.S. Tefana B *A.S. Teva *A.S. Vaiete ==Last champions== *2018-19: * 2017-18: AS Jeunes Tahitiens Fédération Tahitienne de Football * 2016-17: AS Tamarii Punaruu RSSSF * 2015-16: AS Tefana B RSSSF * 2014-15: AS Tefana B RSSSF * 2013-14: AS Aorai RSSSF * 2012-13: A.S. Taravao RSSSF * 2011-12: unknown * 2010-11: unknown * 2009-10: A.S. Vairao RSSSF ==References== ==External Links== *Fixtures and results at Fédération Tahitienne de Football Category:Football competitions in Tahiti
title: Tahiti Ligue 2
